title: Two Best Monthly Picks From The S&P 100
text: Given the explosion over the past decade in stock market information and advice, it is not surprising that few investors or traders take the time to look at monthly data on stocks or ETFs. As each month ends I run several different scans on different lists, indices and sectors.

title: How The Times's Apple Reporter Covers the Company
text: Since 2022, Tripp Mickle has covered news surrounding one of the biggest technology companies in Silicon Valley.

title: The Top 7 Stocks to Buy Now: Summer 2024
text: Catalysts are forming around a lot of the top stocks right now, making this a good time for investors to buy. Many companies are seeing a boost in their share price following strong earnings reports.

title: AAPL or AMZN: Which Mag 7 Stock Should You Buy Before Earnings?
text: Investors are eagerly awaiting results from Apple (AAPL) and Amazon (AMZN) to get a glimpse of the growing impact of AI, including Generative AI.

title: Apple ETFs to Buy Ahead of its Fiscal Q3 Earnings
text: The tech giant has a strong chance of beating earnings estimates and has seen positive earnings estimate revision activity, which is generally a precursor to an earnings beat.

title: Why You Should Load Up on Apple Stock Before It Reports Earnings on August 1
text: Cupertino giant AppleÂ (NASDAQ: AAPL ) has lagged behind its Magnificent Seven peers in the stock market over the past year. Its stock gained 11.7% last year, trailing the S&P 500's 18% gain.

title: Apple, Nvidia Supplier TSMC Is Surging Higher In Wednesday's Premarket: Here's Why
text: Shares of Apple, Nvidia supplier Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. Ltd. TSM are rising solidly higher in premarket trading on Wednesday.

title: Apple likely to post higher revenue as discounts aid iPhone demand in China
text: Apple will likely report on Thursday that it returned to revenue growth in its fiscal third quarter as it won back some customers in China with big iPhone discounts and sold more high-margin iPads thanks to a refreshed design.

title: Apple earnings will be all about this one clue
text: Apple Inc.'s June-quarter earnings report isn't typically one to write home about, but there's still value to it.
